name: Private Exhibition
description:
Everything is going to be alright. Nobody can even see me in here. Right?

Downloading the game is recommended.

Sound Attributions:

Low fi science fiction rumble by CuddleNucks (used as the ambient hum before leaving your house. Not the sound emanating from the door. Trimmed)

Hum with attitude by Zrte (used as the sound emanating from the door. Pitch shifted down and trimmed)

Cricket 3 by le_abbaye_Noirla

Gasp by klankbeeld

Yawning by ckvoiceover

Models and textures were collected from the Unity Asset Store.
